snippet.title: The Ring: Terror's Realm (Sega Dreamcast, 2000) Long Play - No Commentary
snippet.description: We're bringing back That's A Game as a podcast pilot. The subject of the pilot episode is going to be "The Ring: Terror's Realm" on Dreamcast. We had played this as a Let's Play which ended with us getting stuck at the end. So I played through the entire game in one sitting to see the ending. I now offer my entire longplay here so you can get familiar with the game before the podcast goes up. Enjoy!(?)
